channel.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
channel.description:
How would i go about creating a new user rank in pi. Trying to add a super admin.
thanks

item.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
item.dc:creator: @PlucScape PlucScape
item.description:
@PlucScape wrote:

Congratulations, you just spread the obvious all over us.
Of course, you could also use rights = 56
But that would, unfortunately, do no difference than rights = 3 or rights = 4 or rights = 5.
But nice try.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)

item.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

I just put character-rights = 5 and it seemed to work for a custom rank lol

Read full topic
item.source: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)

item.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“PlucScape, post:5, topic:385068”][quote author=sandboxpvp link=topic=480835.msg3520754#msg3520754 date=1299380402]
you must not get it… you cant becuase its hard core coded into the server. and you cant even fix a teleport
[/quote]

You CAN change teleports.
And as for the post right after mine, I had doubts. So what? I answered to the best of my knowledge like I always do. So if you have a problem against it please make a thread about it.
Anyhow let’s not start a fight in this forum.

If you would be able to change THAT, it would be in player.java or client.java and such things regarding both players and client at the same time. Good luck though, I don’t think it’s ever been done on a 317.[/quote]

I apologize.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)

item.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
item.dc:creator: @PlucScape PlucScape
item.description:
@PlucScape wrote:

sandboxpvp:

you must not get it… you cant becuase its hard core coded into the server. and you cant even fix a teleport

You CAN change teleports.
And as for the post right after mine, I had doubts. So what? I answered to the best of my knowledge like I always do. So if you have a problem against it please make a thread about it.
Anyhow let’s not start a fight in this forum.

If you would be able to change THAT, it would be in player.java or client.java and such things regarding both players and client at the same time. Good luck though, I don’t think it’s ever been done on a 317.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)

item.title: Making a new user rank (super admin) (pi)
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“PlucScape, post:2, topic:385068”]You can’t.

There’s only 0,1,2,3,4 as far as I know and 4 is hidden admin.[/quote]

You’re wrong, you can.

Read full topic
